trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around November 4th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi keep seeing these orbs that are white but flash or pulsate red and i have seen for about 4 days now most recent was 2 days ago on 11\4\08 over moore oklahoma at a parking lot across to a wall-mart 630 to 700 it was stationary and moved just a little bit to the right or left about every 5 mins or so and when i was home in okc after 10 i saw out above my back yard this time it was moving north very very slowly it was over my house for over a hour still flashing red but not like a separate light more like the whole thing turns red then back to white i reported a plain white orb last month i don't know if there related but i got a bad feeling they are i keep seeing these it seems like no matter where i am and my friend says he think he saw the same thing back in late october during sundown but it seems like to me that there following me or watching me i look up a lot and i have great eye-sight i always notice when something not right i thinks what helping me notice this when i first say the one in moore i thought it was plane at first but it wasn't moving or making sound when i saw the one over my house i knew it was the same one but much lower to the ground or horizon i never lost sight of it moore i just left because i had to get home and my house it just flew over behind some houses and trees i felt kinda like something was not right or like a presence of something when i saw them its kinda hard to describe but this kind of sensation came over me like when your in a room full of people and everyone of them is looking at you
